attributes.action: Turn The United Kingdom Into A Communist State
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I Watched Animal Farm And Thought The Pigs Were Correct In Their Decisions.

So Lets Do This Right Now.

Lets Make The United Kingdom,
A Full Blown Communist State.

Forget What History Has Told Us.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
